Package com.pump.text

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Abbreviation
    Static helper methods related to abbreviation.
    ColoredIterator
    This filters the AttributedCharacterIterator so all text is rendered in one color only.
    TextBoxHighlightPainter
    This combines a TextBlock and a Highlighter.HighlightPainter.
    TextComponentHighlighter
    This abstract helper class triggers certain methods as a JTextComponent is updated and constantly reapplies formatting rules and highlights.
    TextDiff
    This object can diff two Strings together to find the minimal amount of changes between the two.
    TextDiff.DiffSegment
    This represents a segment of a diff solution.
    TextDiff.SharedSegment
    This segment represents the same text for both branches.
    TextDiff.SplitSegment
    This segment represents two unique Strings depending on whether you're reading branch A or B.
    UnderlineHighlightPainter  
    WildcardPattern
    This is a specialized pattern matching mechanism for common wildcard conventions.
    WildcardPattern.FixedCharacter
    This placeholder is used for a non-wildcard character.
    WildcardPattern.Placeholder
    An element of a WildcardPattern.
    WildcardPattern.QuestionMarkWildcard
    The QuestionMarkWildcard is used to represent exactly one character.
    WildcardPattern.SquareBracketsWildcard
    The SquareBracketsWildcard is used to represent one of a finite set of characters.
    WildcardPattern.StarWildcard
    The star wildcard has the broadest meaning of any of the wildcards, as it can represent zero characters, all single characters or any string.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TextDiff.Branch
    A designation of which branch (A or B) you're interested in examining.
